summary.para: Called to allow a system language bar item extension to add items to a system language bar menu.

param.name: pMenu
param.para: Pointer to an interface that the system language bar item uses to add items to the system language bar menu.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

summary.para: Called when the user selects an item in the system menu added by the system language bar menu extension.

param.name: wID
param.para: Specifies the identifier of the menu item selected. This is the value passed for uId in .

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

summary.para: The ITfSystemLangBarItemSink interface is implemented by a system language bar menu extension and used by a system language bar menu (host) to allow menu items to be added to an existing system language bar menu. The extension obtains an instance of this interface by calling QueryInterface on the object with IID_ITfSystemLangBarItemSink. It can then pass the object to the host by calling .

remarks.para: A system language bar menu is an object on the language bar that supports menu items added to it by third-partyextensions. The system item must support the interface and support the IID_ITfSystemLangBarItemSink identifier in its ITfSource.AdviseSink implementation. The system item should also implement the interface. The system item uses the ITfSystemLangBarItemSink interface to allow the extension to add its items.
